name: DeltaGreen® Lavender Air Freshener DG-2450
description: DeltaGreen® Lavender Air Freshener DG-2450 neutralizes unwanted odors. The long-lasting fragrance eliminates the toughest odors from the air, leaving behind a light, clean scent. This is the all-natural way to eliminate tough odors, including the smell of cigarette smoke, and to create a positive, clean atmosphere. Biodegradable. For the strongest odors, use full strength. For a lighter scent, while still working as a highly-effective odor counteractant.
